001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Code;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Text;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRendererOptions;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlWriter;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderer;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererContext;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererFactory;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderingHandler;
017import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
018import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
019import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
020import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataHolder;
021import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.Escaping;
022import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.Range;
023import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.SequenceUtils;
024
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
026
027import java.util.Collections;
028import java.util.Set;
029import java.util.regex.Pattern;
030
031import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
032import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
034
035public class HtmlCodeRenderExtension
036    implements HtmlRenderer.HtmlRendererExtension {
037  private static final Pattern EOL_PATTERN = Pattern.compile("\r\n|\r|\n");
038
039  /**
040   * Construct a new extension instance.
041   *
042   * @return the instance
043   */
044  public static HtmlCodeRenderExtension newInstance() {
045    return new HtmlCodeRenderExtension();
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public void rendererOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
050    // do nothing
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public void extend(HtmlRenderer.Builder rendererBuilder, String rendererType) {
055    rendererBuilder.nodeRendererFactory(new CodeNodeHtmlRenderer.Factory());
056  }
057
058  static final class CodeNodeHtmlRenderer implements NodeRenderer {
059    private final boolean codeSoftLineBreaks;
060
061    private CodeNodeHtmlRenderer(DataHolder options) {
062      codeSoftLineBreaks = Parser.CODE_SOFT_LINE_BREAKS.get(options);
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    @Nullable
067    public Set<NodeRenderingHandler<?>> getNodeRenderingHandlers() {
068      return Collections.singleton(
069          new NodeRenderingHandler<>(Code.class, this::render));
070    }
071
072    @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "RV_RETURN_VALUE_IGNORED_NO_SIDE_EFFECT", justification = "false positive")
073    private void render( // NOPMD actually used in lambda
074        @NonNull Code node,
075        @NonNull NodeRendererContext context,
076        @NonNull HtmlWriter html) {
077      HtmlRendererOptions htmlOptions = context.getHtmlOptions();
078
079      boolean customTag = htmlOptions.codeStyleHtmlOpen != null || htmlOptions.codeStyleHtmlClose != null;
080      if (customTag) {
081        html.raw(ObjectUtils.notNull(htmlOptions.codeStyleHtmlOpen));
082      } else {
083        if (context.getHtmlOptions().sourcePositionParagraphLines) {
084          html.withAttr().tag("code");
085        } else {
086          html.srcPos(node.getText()).withAttr().tag("code");
087        }
088      }
089
090      if (codeSoftLineBreaks && !htmlOptions.isSoftBreakAllSpaces) {
091        for (Node child : node.getChildren()) {
092          if (child instanceof Text) {
093            html.text(Escaping.collapseWhitespace(child.getChars(), false));
094          } else {
095            context.render(child);
096          }
097        }
098      } else {
099        String text = EOL_PATTERN.matcher(node.getText()).replaceAll(" ");
100        if (!text.isBlank() && SequenceUtils.startsWithWhitespace(text) && SequenceUtils.endsWithWhitespace(text)) {
101          html.text(SequenceUtils.subSequence(text, Range.of(1, text.length() - 1)));
102        } else {
103          html.raw(Escaping.escapeHtml(text, false));
104        }
105        // html.text(Escaping.collapseWhitespace(node.getText(), true));
106      }
107
108      if (customTag) {
109        html.raw(ObjectUtils.notNull(htmlOptions.codeStyleHtmlClose));
110      } else {
111        html.tag("/code");
112      }
113    }
114
115    public static class Factory implements NodeRendererFactory {
116
117      @Override
118      public NodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
119        return new CodeNodeHtmlRenderer(options);
120      }
121
122    }
123  }
124}
